text: 8:18 Matyu 13:12; 25:29; Luk 19:26Kamaghɨn amizɨ ia deraghvɨra akar kam baragh. Gumazitam o amizitam Godɨn akabagh foghtɨ, God uan akabar fofozir igharaziba a danɨngam, eghtɨ a Godɨn akar avɨribagh fogham. Eghtɨ Godɨn akabagh foghan aghuazir gumazim o amizim, an fofozir muziarim God a dam a inigham.”
